channel.title: Sports Section
channel.description: I think a section to discuss upcoming games and sports section would be a great idea :D

item.title: Sports Section
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

great idea!
I voted yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Sports Section
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:41, topic:276243”][quote author=Man UTD Freak link=topic=364811.msg2981021#msg2981021 date=1254607773]

Yes, I can finally talk about how baseball sucks.

true dat, we watched one game over on one of the sports channels, it was boring as fuck how americans watch that i’ll never know

I’m English and I have found that I have a liking in playing and watching Baseball even though I have barely ever played it at all. Baseball has its similarities with Cricket which may be a reason in having a liking of Baseball.
[/quote]
imo though cricket is way more exciting/fun than baseball[/quote]

True.

Read full topic

item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

I think baseball, football, soccer, golf, and rugby are all gay. I just like a little of basketball.

item.title: Sports Section
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Can we have a sub section for bowls? I love watching old people roll balls on the green. When you look into their eyes you can see that all sense of fun has disappeared, replaced by an agonising wait for death.

Read full topic

item.title: Sports Section
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Cowie`:

they’re both boring

QFT’d. I’m only interested in knowing that Australia wins/loses; I could never sit through a test match (20 20 games are alright though).

Baseball is good in the sense that it’s kept to a reasonable length when compared to other sports. Cricket just drags on.

Read full topic

item.title: Sports Section
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:35, topic:276243”][quote author=Man UTD Freak link=topic=364811.msg2976154#msg2976154 date=1254288106]

Does not change the fact you couldn’t beat poor old everton.

When we played Everton in the FA Cup and lost on penalties, we rested a number of our key players (Rooney, Ronaldo, Van Der Sar, Giggs, O’Shea, Fletcher and Carrick just to name a few) from this game and therefore this result came to be. I’m sorry about the timing of this post being just a tad late.
[/quote]

You’ve got the ability to sub players for a reason so don’t come out with that.[/quote]

Fair enough since Manchester United’s 2nd XI is just about almost as good as their 1st XI.

Read full topic
